## Motivation

As of 2018, over [3 Billion people]{.hi} live in rural areas in developing countries and about 25% of them in [extreme poverty]{.hi}

::: {.fragment}
[Why do we discuss agriculture so much?]{.h}
:::

::: {.incremental}
- Many people in developing nations [work in agriculture]{.hi}
- We would like to address [subsitence economies]{.hp}
- There is a "somewhat" positive relationship between growth in agriculture and growth in GDP
:::
